title: Casino Operator Bally’s Shares Jump on Standard General Buyout Offer
sub_head: Stock soars more than 20% after Standard General offers to buy the shares it doesn’t already own in a deal that values the company at $2.07 billion
body:
Shares of casino operator Bally’s Corp . jumped more than 20% on Tuesday after the company’s largest shareholder, hedge fund Standard General LP, submitted an offer to buy the remaining stock it doesn’t already own for $38 a share.
Standard General, which already owns a 21% stake in Bally’s, on Tuesday submitted a letter to the Bally’s board detailing the offer, which Bally disclosed in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
